title: Ticket #6684: Change parameters for setting CA files for GAHPs
description:
For GAHPs that use SSL authentication, the gridmanager piggybacked on the SOAP config parameters for specifying CA files (SOAP_SSL_CA_FILE and SOAP_SSL_CA_DIR). Now that SOAP is gone from HTCondor, we should use different parameters for the GAHP configuration.

We've decided to not overload the existing parameters for CEDAR SSL authentication (AUTH_SSL_CLIENT_CAFILE and AUTH_SSL_CLIENT_CADIR), since we may not want to trust the CA used by a third-party cloud service for local pool security. Instead, we'll introduce new parameters specific to the GAHPs.
